data.name: PropertyDescriptionControlShowHint
data.value: Gets or sets whether to show a hint displaying the current property description when the property description is trimmed in the PropertyDescriptionControl.

data.name: PropertyDescriptionControlPropertyGrid
data.value: Gets or sets the target PropertyGridControl for which property descriptions are displayed in the current control.

data.name: PropertyDescriptionControlLookAndFeel
data.value: Provides access to the settings that control the control's look and feel.

data.name: PropertyDescriptionControlBorderStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the control's border style.

data.name: PropertyDescriptionControlAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the control's elements.

data.name: PGridOptionsViewPasswordChar
data.value: Gets or sets the password character displayed instead of actual characters. Password mode is enabled for fields marked with the PasswordPropertyTextAttribute attribute.

data.name: PGridOptionsBehaviorPropertySort
data.value: Gets or sets the way properties are sorted in the PropertyGridControl.

data.name: PGridOptionsBehaviorAllowDynamicRowLoading
data.value: Gets or sets whether a selected object's properties are loaded dynamically.

data.name: MultiEditorRowSeparatorString
data.value: Gets or sets the string used as an item cell separator within a multi-editor row.

data.name: MultiEditorRowSeparatorKind
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying the type of the item cell separator displayed within a multi-editor row.

data.name: MultiEditorRowPropertiesWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of a row item.

data.name: MultiEditorRowPropertiesCollectionItem
data.value: Gets a row item from the MultiEditorRow.PropertiesCollection by the bound field name.

data.name: MultiEditorRowPropertiesCollectionCount
data.value: Gets the actual number of row items contained within the MultiEditorRow.PropertiesCollection.

data.name: MultiEditorRowPropertiesCollection
data.value: Gets a collection of items within a multi-editor row.

data.name: MultiEditorRowPropertiesCellWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of the data cells in a multi-editor row.

data.name: EditorRowProperties
data.value: Gets an object containing settings specific to an editor row.

data.name: EditorRowEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row allows cell editors to be invoked.

data.name: CategoryRowTabStop
data.value: Gets or sets whether the user can move focus to the category row using the TAB/SHIFT+TAB key.

data.name: CategoryRowPropertiesRowHandle
data.value: Gets the position of the associated field within a data source.

data.name: CategoryRowPropertiesRowEditName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the row's editor.

data.name: CategoryRowProperties
data.value: Gets the category row's settings.

data.name: CategoryRowMaxCaptionLineCount
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of text lines used to display the category's caption.

data.name: BaseRowVisible
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a row can be displayed within a vertical grid control.

data.name: BaseRowTag
data.value: Gets or sets a value that identifies the current row object.

data.name: BaseRowTabStop
data.value: Gets or sets whether the user can move focus to the cell using the TAB/SHIFT+TAB or ENTER key.

data.name: BaseRowProperties
data.value: Gets an object containing type specific row settings.

data.name: BaseRowOptionsRow
data.value: Provides access to the current row's options.

data.name: BaseRowMaxCaptionLineCount
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum number of text lines used to display the row header's caption.

data.name: BaseRowHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the row's height.

data.name: BaseRowFixed
data.value: Gets or sets whether the row is fixed (anchored to a control's top or bottom edge).

data.name: BaseRowExpanded
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the current row is expanded.

data.name: BaseRowAppearance
data.value: Gets the appearance settings used to paint the row's cells.

data.name: PropertyGridControlOptionsView
data.value: Provides access to the vertical grid's display options.

data.name: PropertyGridControlOptionsMenu
data.value: Contains options that affect the display of context menus in a PropertyGridControl.

data.name: PropertyGridControlOptionsBehavior
data.value: Provides access to the grid's behavior options.

data.name: PropertyGridControlLayoutStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the control's layout style.

data.name: PropertyGridControlCustomPropertyDescriptors
data.value: Allows you to filter properties or display custom properties.

data.name: PropertyGridControlAutoGenerateRows
data.value: Gets or sets whether rows are automatically created in the control for all fields in the bound object.

data.name: PropertyGridControlScrollVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies the availability of the vertical scroll bar.

data.name: PropertyGridControlSelectedObject
data.value: Gets or sets the object whose settings are edited by the PropertyGridControl.

data.name: PropertyGridControlShowMenu
data.value: Allows context menus for rows to be customized.

data.name: RowOperationNeedsFullIteration
data.value: Gets a value indicating whether all rows or only parent rows are processed.

data.name: RowPropertiesCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the caption for a row item.

data.name: RowPropertiesCustomizationCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the row's caption when its header is displayed within the Customization Form.

data.name: RowPropertiesFieldName
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the data source field to bind to a row item.

data.name: RowPropertiesFormat
data.value: Gets the object that specifies the formatting applied to row values.

data.name: RowPropertiesImageIndex
data.value: Gets or sets the index of the image displayed within a row item header.

data.name: RowPropertiesReadOnly
data.value: Gets or sets whether the current editor row is read only.

data.name: RowPropertiesRowEdit
data.value: Gets or sets the repository item that specifies the editor used to edit a row item's cell values.

data.name: RowPropertiesShowUnboundExpressionMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether an end-user can open an Expression Editor for the current unbound row, using a context menu.

data.name: RowPropertiesToolTip
data.value: Gets or sets a custom tooltip for the current row header.

data.name: RowPropertiesUnboundExpression
data.value: Gets or sets an expression used to evaluate values for the current unbound row.

data.name: RowPropertiesUnboundType
data.value: Gets or sets the data type and binding mode of the row.

data.name: RowPropertiesValue
data.value: Gets or sets the value of a row item's data cell when the grid is in Unbound Mode.

data.name: VGridControlBaseAppearance
data.value: Provides access to the properties that control the appearance of the vertical grid's elements.

data.name: VGridControlBaseBandsInterval
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between bands.

data.name: VGridControlBaseBeforeLoadLayout
data.value: Occurs before a layout is restored from storage (a stream, xml file or the system registry).

data.name: VGridControlBaseBorderStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the border style for the vertical grid.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCellValueChanged
data.value: Fires immediately after a cell's value has been changed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCellValueChanging
data.value: Fires in response to changing the edit value.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCustomDrawRowHeaderCell
data.value: Enables row header cells to be painted manually.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCustomDrawRowHeaderIndent
data.value: Enables row header indents to be painted manually.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCustomDrawRowValueCell
data.value: Enables data cells to be painted manually.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCustomDrawSeparator
data.value: Enables cell separators to be painted manually.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCustomDrawTreeButton
data.value: Enables expand buttons to be painted manually.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCustomizationFormCreatingCategory
data.value: Fires when an end-user tries to create a new category row within the Customization Form.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCustomizationFormDeletingCategory
data.value: Fires when an end-user tries to delete a category row from the Customization Form.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCustomRecordCellEdit
data.value: Enables editors to be assigned to individual cells.

data.name: VGridControlBaseCustomRecordCellEditForEditing
data.value: Allows you to assign a custom editor to a cell for in-place editing, and so override the default row editor, which is by default, used both in display and edit modes.

data.name: VGridControlBaseDataSourceChanged
data.value: Fires after the grid's data source has been changed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseEndDragRow
data.value: Fires after a row drag and drop operation has been completed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseFocusedRecordCellChanged
data.value: Fires in response to cell focus changing from one cell to another in a record if the previously and currently focused cells have different indexes.

data.name: VGridControlBaseFocusedRecordChanged
data.value: Fires in response to record focus changing.

data.name: VGridControlBaseFocusedRowChanged
data.value: Fires in response to row focus moving.

data.name: VGridControlBaseGridLayout
data.value: Fires after the grid's layout has been changed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseHiddenEditor
data.value: Fires after an inplace editor has been closed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseHideCustomizationForm
data.value: Fires before the Customization Form is closed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseImageList
data.value: Gets or sets the source of row header images.

data.name: VGridControlBaseInitNewRecord
data.value: Enables added records to be initialized.

data.name: VGridControlBaseInvalidRecordException
data.value: Fires when a record fails validation or when it cannot be saved to the data source.

data.name: VGridControlBaseInvalidValueException
data.value: Enables a proper response to entering an invalid cell value to be provided.

data.name: VGridControlBaseLayoutUpgrade
data.value: Occurs after a layout whose version doesn't match the current layout version has been loaded from storage (a stream, xml file or system registry).

data.name: VGridControlBaseLeftVisibleRecordChanged
data.value: Fires when the VGridControlBase.LeftVisibleRecord property's value is changed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseLookAndFeel
data.value: Provides access to the settings that control the vertical grid's look and feel.

data.name: VGridControlBaseOptionsBehavior
data.value: Provides access to the vertical grid's behavior options.

data.name: VGridControlBaseOptionsFind
data.value: Provides access to settings controlling the behavior and visibility of the Find Panel and its elements.

data.name: VGridControlBaseOptionsHint
data.value: Provides access to the control's tooltip options.

data.name: VGridControlBaseOptionsLayout
data.value: Provides access to options that specify how a control's layout is stored to and restored from a data store (a stream, xml file or the system registry).

data.name: VGridControlBaseOptionsMenu
data.value: Provides access to the control's menu options.

data.name: VGridControlBaseOptionsSelectionAndFocus
data.value: Provides access to the vertical grid's selection and focus options.

data.name: VGridControlBaseOptionsView
data.value: Provides access to the vertical grid's display options.

data.name: VGridControlBasePopupMenuShowing
data.value: Allows context menus for rows to be customized.

data.name: VGridControlBaseProcessDragRow
data.value: Fires when a user drags a row.

data.name: VGridControlBaseRecordCellStyle
data.value: Enables the appearance settings of individual cells to be changed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseRecordsInterval
data.value: Gets or sets the distance between records.

data.name: VGridControlBaseRecordWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the record's width, in either absolute or relative values, according to the currently applied layout.

data.name: VGridControlBaseRecordWidthChanged
data.value: Fires after a record's width has been changed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseRowChanged
data.value: Fires after a row's property has been changed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseRowChanging
data.value: Fires when changing a row's property.

data.name: VGridControlBaseRowHeaderWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of row headers.

data.name: VGridControlBaseRowHeaderWidthChanged
data.value: Fires after the width of row headers has been changed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseRowHeaderWidthChangeStep
data.value: Gets or sets a value by which the VGridControlBase.RowHeaderWidth property changes when using CTRL + LEFT or CTRL + RIGHT key combinations.

data.name: VGridControlBaseScrollsStyle
data.value: Gets the style which is applied to the scroll bars.

data.name: VGridControlBaseScrollVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies the availability of scroll elements.

data.name: VGridControlBaseShowButtonMode
data.value: Gets or sets the manner in which editor buttons are displayed within a vertical grid.

data.name: VGridControlBaseShowCustomizationForm
data.value: Fires after the Customization Form has been invoked.

data.name: VGridControlBaseShowingEditor
data.value: Allows the editor's activation to be canceled.

data.name: VGridControlBaseShowMenu
data.value: Allows context menus for rows to be customized.

data.name: VGridControlBaseShownEditor
data.value: Fires after a cell editor has been invoked.

data.name: VGridControlBaseStartDragRow
data.value: Fires before a row is dragged by an end-user.

data.name: VGridControlBaseStateChanged
data.value: Fires after the vertical grid's state has been changed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseTopVisibleRowIndexChanged
data.value: Fires when the VGridControlBase.TopVisibleRowIndex property's value is changed.

data.name: VGridControlBaseTreeButtonStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the style which is used to display category row tree buttons.

data.name: VGridControlBaseUseDisabledStatePainter
data.value: Gets or sets whether the control is painted grayed out, when it's in the disabled state.

data.name: VGridControlBaseValidateRecord
data.value: Enables you to specify whether record data is valid and whether the record can lose focus.

data.name: VGridControlBaseValidatingEditor
data.value: Enables you to perform manual validation of cell values.

data.name: VGridControlCustomUnboundData
data.value: Enables data to be provided to and modified data to be saved from unbound rows.

data.name: VGridControlDataMember
data.value: Gets or sets a data source member whose data is supplied to the vertical grid control.

data.name: VGridControlDataSource
data.value: Gets or sets the vertical grid's data source.

data.name: VGridControlLayoutStyle
data.value: Gets or sets the Vertical Grid Control's layout style.

data.name: VGridControlRecordUpdated
data.value: Occurs after the modified focused record has been saved to the underlying data source.

data.name: VGridControlUnboundExpressionEditorCreated
data.value: Fires after an Expression Editor has been created for an unbound column.

data.name: VGridCustomizationFormCategoryItemWidth
data.value: Gets the width of category row headers displayed on the Categories page of the Customization Form.

data.name: VGridCustomizationFormPressedRow
data.value: Gets or sets a row whose header is dragged from the Customization Form.

data.name: VGridCustomizationFormRowItemWidth
data.value: Represents the width of row headers displayed on the Rows page of the Customization Form.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorAllowAnimatedScrolling
data.value: Gets or sets whether an animation effect is used while scrolling vertically.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorAutoFocusNewRecord
data.value: Gets or sets whether adding a new record to an underlying data source automatically moves focus to the corresponding grid record.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorAutoSelectAllInEditor
data.value: Gets or sets whether the entire contents of the editor is selected when a cell's editor is activated using the mouse, ENTER or F2 keys.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorCopyToClipboardWithRowHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether row captions are copied to the clipboard when CTRL+C is pressed or the CopyToClipboard method is called.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorDragRowHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to move row headers using drag and drop.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorEditable
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users are allowed to invoke cell editors.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorPreserveChildRows
data.value: Gets or sets whether child rows remain hidden if their parent row is removed from the Customization Form using drag and drop.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorRecordsMouseWheel
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users scroll through records or rows when scrolling using the mouse wheel.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorResizeHeaderPanel
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can change the row header panel's width.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorResizeRowHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can resize row headers.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorResizeRowValues
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can change the width of the records by dragging their edges.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorShowEditorOnMouseUp
data.value: Gets or sets whether a cell's editor is activated when the mouse button is released from a click within the cell.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorSmartExpand
data.value: Gets or sets whether rows are automatically scrolled vertically when a parent row is expanded so that the maximum number of child rows possible is visible onscreen.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorUseDefaultEditorsCollection
data.value: Gets or sets whether editors from the PropertyGridControl.DefaultEditors collection are used to represent and edit row values of specific types.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorUseEnterAsTab
data.value: Gets or sets whether pressing the ENTER key hides the currently active cell editor saving the changes made to its content and moves focus to the next row's cell activating its editor.

data.name: VGridOptionsBehaviorUseTabKey
data.value: Gets or sets whether the TAB/SHIFT + TAB key combinations move focus to the next/previous cell or to the next/previous control in the tab order.

data.name: VGridOptionsFindClearFindOnClose
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Find Panel's search (filter) string is cleared when the Find Panel is hidden.

data.name: VGridOptionsFindFindDelay
data.value: Gets or sets the delay, in milliseconds, after which a data search is initiated (if automatic search mode is active).

data.name: VGridOptionsFindFindFilterColumns
data.value: Gets or sets the field names against which searches are performed by the Find Panel.

data.name: VGridOptionsFindFindMode
data.value: Gets or sets whether a data search starts automatically, or must be started manually.

data.name: VGridOptionsFindFindNullPrompt
data.value: Gets or sets the text that is displayed grayed out when the search box is empty.

data.name: VGridOptionsFindHighlightFindResults
data.value: Gets or sets whether the search string is highlighted within located records.

data.name: VGridOptionsFindShowClearButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Clear button is displayed within the Find Panel.

data.name: VGridOptionsFindShowCloseButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the close ('x') button is displayed within the Find Panel.

data.name: VGridOptionsFindShowFindButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Find button is displayed within the Find Panel.

data.name: VGridOptionsFindVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets whether the Find Panel can be accessed by an end-user.

data.name: VGridOptionsHintShowCellHints
data.value: Gets or sets whether hints are displayed for cells with truncated content.

data.name: VGridOptionsHintShowRowHeaderHints
data.value: Gets or sets whether tooltips are supported for row headers.

data.name: VGridOptionsMenuEnableContextMenu
data.value: Gets or sets whether context menus for rows are enabled.

data.name: VGridOptionsRowAllowFocus
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can move focus to the row using either the mouse or keyboard.

data.name: VGridOptionsRowAllowHtmlText
data.value: Gets or sets whether the row caption is formatted using HTML tags.

data.name: VGridOptionsRowAllowMove
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can drag the row's header.

data.name: VGridOptionsRowAllowMoveToCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can drag the row's header to the Customization Form.

data.name: VGridOptionsRowAllowSize
data.value: Gets or sets whether end-users can drag the bottom edge of a row's header to change the row's height.

data.name: VGridOptionsRowDblClickExpanding
data.value: Gets or sets whether a parent row is expanded after its header has been double clicked.

data.name: VGridOptionsRowShowInCustomizationForm
data.value: Gets or sets whether the row's header is displayed within the Customization Form when the row is hidden.

data.name: VGridOptionsSelectionAndFocusEnableAppearanceFocusedRow
data.value: Gets or sets whether the appearance settings used to paint the header of the focused row are enabled.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewAllowGlyphSkinning
data.value: Gets or sets whether row and band icons within this View should be painted using the foreground color of these rows and bands.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewAllowHtmlText
data.value: Gets or sets whether the row captions are formatted using HTML tags.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewAutoScaleBands
data.value: Gets or sets whether bands are stretched to occupy the entire control.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewFixedLineWidth
data.value: Gets or sets the width of fixed row dividers.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewFixRowHeaderPanelWidth
data.value: Gets or sets whether the width of row headers remain constant when the control's size or layout style is changed.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewLevelIndent
data.value: Gets or sets the horizontal indent for child rows.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewMaxRowAutoHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum height for rows, when the row auto-height feature is enabled.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewMinRowAutoHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum height for rows, when the row auto-height feature is enabled.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewShowButtons
data.value: Gets or sets whether expand buttons are displayed within parent rows.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewShowEmptyRowImage
data.value: Gets or sets whether the captions of row headers are shifted right regardless of whether an image is shown within the row header.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewShowFocusedFrame
data.value: Gets or sets whether a focus frame is displayed around the focused cell.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewShowHorzLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether horizontal lines are displayed.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewShowRootCategories
data.value: Gets or sets whether top-level category rows are visible.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewShowRows
data.value: Gets or sets whether row headers are displayed.

data.name: VGridOptionsViewShowVertLines
data.value: Gets or sets whether vertical lines are displayed..

data.name: VGridRowsCount
data.value: Gets the number of elements in the collection.

data.name: VGridRowsFirstVisible
data.value: Gets the first row from the collection whose BaseRow.Visible property is true.

data.name: VGridRowsItem
data.value: Gets a row object from the rows collection at the specified position.

data.name: VGridRowsLastVisible
data.value: Gets the last row from the collection whose BaseRow.Visible property is true.

data.name: VGridRowsVisibleRowsCount
data.value: Gets the number of rows whose BaseRow.Visible property is true.
